channel.title: Sustainability on Greg Macfarlane
channel.description: Recent content in Sustainability on Greg Macfarlane

item.title: Can Utah County Choose to Grow Sustainably?
item.description: Last week the Deseret News ran a contributed opinion piece by Andrew Skabelund1 in which he argued that the rapid development of Silicon Slopes in north Utah County comes at the cost of Utah County’s value as agricultural land. I think the choice isn’t an either-or proposition, if we can develop sustainably. See my response at the Deseret News. Who was a friend and classmate of mine way back at Wasatch Elementary School!
